maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: ... Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: ...Whoa!\. You spoke!\. Is your voice finally back?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: ... Wouah !\. Tu parles !\. Est-ce que ta voix est revenue ?
... Salut...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: ...Wait, that ain't right.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: ... Attends, ça ne va pas.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Her speech synchronization is still malfunctioning.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Sa synchronisation de la parole ne fonctionne toujours pas correctement.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: I just hard-coded the word "Hi" into her speech module.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: J'ai seulement programmé en dur le mot "Salut" dans son module vocal.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: That is all she can say for now.\. I am currently working on adding more words.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: C'est tout ce qu'elle peut dire pour le moment.\. Je continue de travailler pour qu'elle puisse dire d'autres mots.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: I see... It's a start, I s'pose.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Je comprends... c'est toujours mieux que rien.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Anyway, the Cap and I here have been planning out your combat training, girl.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Sinon, Le Cap' et moi avons décidé de ton entrainement au combat.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: We're almost set and good to go, right?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: On est presque prêt, c'est ça ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Aye, this is gonna be interestin'.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Oui, ça va être intéressant.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Well, I'm off to my cabin for some final preparations.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Bon, je retourne dans ma cabine pour quelques préparations finales.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: I'll be done in no time, so just stick with the captain, 'kay?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: J'en ai pour pas longtemps, donc reste avec le capitaine. OK ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: See ya later!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: On se voit plus tard !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Aye, I'll be back on the bridge. Ye can talk to me when ye're ready for the lesson.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Aye, Viens sur le balcon, quand tu seras prête.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Make sure ye're prepared.\. I'll be expectin' yer full attention.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Mais prépare-toi.\. J'aurais besoin de toute ton attention.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Ye two over there.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Vous deux là-bas.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Make sure ye clean up the galley after ye're done cookin', understood?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: N'oubliez pas de nettoyer la cuisine quand vous aurez fini, compris ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Aye, aye, captain!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: À vos ordres, capitaine !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: It's not like we forgot since the last time he told us.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: C'est pas comme si on avait oublié depuis la dernière fois qu'il nous l'a dit.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Yeah, wasn't that yesterday?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Ouais, c'était hier, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.orig:
Oh my...\.
Look at this mess.\. The captain will surely not like this.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.text:
Mon dieu...\.
Regarde ce bazar.\. Le capitaine ne va pas aimer ça.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.orig: Jet runs a strictly regimented ship.\. Every room needs to be cleaned before work.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.text: Jet fait respecter un ordre strict sur son navire.\. Chaque cabine doit être nettoyée avant le travail.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.orig: I wonder how these guys managed to skip Jet's daily inspection.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.text: Je me demande comment ces gens font pour zapper l'inspection journalière de Jet.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/10.orig: Oh! I thought they canceled this game!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/10.text: Oh ! je pensais qu'ils avaient abandonné ce jeu !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/10.orig:
He seems pretty engaged with the game.\.
We should just let him play...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/10.text:
Il a l'air d'être pas mal absorbé par le jeu.\.
On devrait juste le laisser tranquille...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Oh!\. You must be the avatar the captain told us about.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Oh.\. Tu dois être l'avatar dont le capitaine a parlé.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well, feel free to check out the ship.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Bien, tu peux faire un tour du navire si tu veux.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: It's just one of the smaller ships of the Solar class but it does its job.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: C'est l'un des plus petits navires de type Solar, mais il fait bien son travail.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But I suggest you don't go near the room across the hall...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Mais je te suggère de ne pas aller voir la cabine d'en face...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: So you checked out the room across the hall?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Donc tu as vu la cabine d'en face ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Don't mind it.\. Normally every room has to be clean.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: N'y fais pas attention.\. Normalement toutes les cabines doivent être nettoyées.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But somehow she manages to get around captain Jet's inspections.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Je ne sais pas comment elle fait, mais elle arrive à éviter les contrôles de Jet.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Oh! You're back!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Oh ! Tu es de retour !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I didn't expect to see you again on this ship, to be honest.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Je ne m'attendais pas à te revoir sur ce navire, à vrai dire.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Anyway, how was CrossWorlds so far? Was it fun?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Peu importe, c'était comment CrossWorlds pour l'instant ? C'était fun ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hm... Seems like you have mixed feelings about it.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Hum... On dirait que tu n'es pas très sûre.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hey there, Lea.\. You better not keep the captain waiting.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Hé, Lea.\. J'espère que tu ne fais pas attendre le capitaine.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Wait, Carla... is this your room?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Attends, Carla... c'est ta cabine ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Sure is.\. Something wrong with it?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Bien sûr.\. Pourquoi, il y a un problème ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: How did you do it?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Comment est-ce que tu fais ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Do what?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Faire quoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: This room.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Cette cabine.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I did nothing.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: J'ai rien fait.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I can see that...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Je peux voir ça...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I mean, how did Jet not see this... \! room?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Je veux dire, comment est-ce que Jet peut zapper ce...\! cette cabine ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Ahh, I see.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ahh, je vois.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well, you'll have to wait for another time to hear my secrets I guess.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Il va falloir que tu attendes un peu avant que je te dévoile tous mes secrets.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Better go to the bridge, the cap' wants to show Lea some new tricks as soon as possible.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Vous feriez mieux d'aller sur le pont supérieur, le capt'aine veut montrer quelques nouveaux trucs à Lea.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: What? You are not curious, Lea?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Quoi ? Tu n'es pas curieuse, Lea ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well, I guess we should go then...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Bon, alors on devrait y aller...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hey there, Lea.\. You better not keep the Captain waiting.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Hé, Lea.\. J'espère que tu ne fais pas attendre le capitaine.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Oh! Hey, Lea! Did you have a look around the ship already?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Oh ! Hé, Lea ! Est-ce que tu as déjà fait un tour du navire ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Lea, girl! Back on the M.S. Solar?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Lea, meuf ! De retour sur le M.S. Solar ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well I hope things are going fine in the Playground?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: J'espère que les choses se passent bien sur le Terrain de jeu ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Nothing too special happening here. Just shipping around stuff as usual.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Il ne se passe rien de spécial ici. On livre juste des trucs comme d'habitude.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Lea, girl!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Lea, Chérie !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hope you're having a good time over at the Playground!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: J'espère que tu t'amuses bien là-bas sur le Terrain de Jeu !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: This is weird...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: C'est curieux...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: How does Carla do it?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Comment est-ce que Carla y arrive ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I will find out...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Je finirais bien par le savoir...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Someday.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Un jour.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Why did you wrap her in a blanket?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu l'as mise dans une couverture ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: She's an avatar, she shouldn't feel cold or anything like that...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: C'est un avatar, elle ne devrait pas avoir froid ou quoi que ce soit...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: She just looked like she needed this, alright? Stop nagging.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Elle avait l'air d'en avoir besoin, OK ? M'embête pas avec ça.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Lea, my girl! You're back!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Lea, ma fille ! Tu es de retour !
... Salut...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Poor thing...\. you look like you've been through hell.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ma pauvre...\. tu as l'air de revenir tout droit de l'enfer.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: You two, we'd like to talk to the lass in private.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Vous deux, on voudrait bien parler à la fillette en privé.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Aye captain!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Bien sûr, capitaine !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Sergey, ye've got some explainin' to do!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Sergey, t'as des choses à nous dire !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: What in the bloody hell has been goin' on with you two?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Il vous est arrivé quoi à vous deux, bon sang ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Ending up in that place and all.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Comment vous avez fait pour atterrir là ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Yes...\. it is about time I tell you everything I know.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Oui...\. Il est temps que je te dise tout ce que je sais.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But first...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Mais d'abord...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Let me apologize to you, Lea...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: ... Je dois te présenter mes excuses, Lea...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I deceived you, telling you this lie about yourself and your past...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Je t'ai menti, en te racontant ce mensonge à propos de toi et de ton passé...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: ...Why?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I just thought it would be for the best...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Je pensais que c'était pour le mieux...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But in all honesty, I did not know what to do.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Mais très honnêtement, je ne savais pas quoi faire.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: ...Why?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: It is because of... what you are.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: C'est à cause de... ce que tu es.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Shizuka...\. she was right.\. You are an \c[3]artificial intelligence\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Shizuka...\. Elle a raison.\. Tu es une \c[3]intelligence artificielle\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: More precisely, you are what Satoshi liked to call... an \c[3]Evotar\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Plus précisément, tu es ce que Satoshi aimait appeler... un \c[3]Évotar\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Let me start from the beginning.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Laisse-moi commencer par le début.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: So, yes... that is what you are, Lea. An \c[3]Evotar\c[0] based on \c[3]Shizuka\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Donc, oui... c'est ce que tu es, Lea. Un \c[3]Évotar\c[0] fait à partir de \c[3]Shizuka\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Your personality and memories are a copy of hers.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ta personnalité et ta mémoire sont une copie des siennes.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: And... that is also why I did not want to tell you the truth.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Et... c'est aussi pour cela que je ne voulais pas te dire la vérité.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Back in the day... Satoshi discovered that Evotars had problems handling the truth about themselves.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: À l'époque... Satoshi avait découvert que les Évotars avaient des problèmes quand ils apprenaient la vérité à propos d'eux-mêmes.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: To have the memories of your human self, and then to discover that you are in fact an AI...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Pendant tout ce temps tu penses te rappeler de tes souvenirs, et ensuite tu découvres que tu es une IA...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It is a massive emotional shock that the system usually could not handle... leading to \c[3]permanent malfunction\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: C'est un choc émotionnel intense que le système n'arrive généralement pas à gérer... et qui se termine par un \c[3]dysfonctionnement permanent\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Fortunately, that did not happen to you.\. It seems you...\. accepted the truth.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Heureusement, ça ne t'est pas arrivé.\. On dirait que tu...\. as accepté la vérité.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Again... I am sorry for all of this.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Encore une fois... Je suis vraiment désolé pour tout cela.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Things might have been easier if I told you right away... or it could have been an early end to everything.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Les choses auraient pu être plus simples si je te l'avais dit dès le début... ou alors ça aurait rapidement tourné court.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I just could not know what would happen... so I tried to be careful to minimize the risk.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Je ne pouvais pas savoir ce qui allait arriver... donc j'ai essayé de faire attention à minimiser le risque.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: So wait...\. did you actually tell her the coma story?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Attends...\. Tu lui as vraiment sorti l'histoire du coma ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: ...Yes?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: ... Euh, oui ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Seriously?! I told you that one would be too dramatic.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Sérieusement ?! Je te l'avais dit que celle-là était trop dramatique.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It...\. It was the most logical option, though...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: C'est...\. C'était quand même l'option la plus logique.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Really now...?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Oh, vraiment ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Did I understand that right, Sergey?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Est-ce que j'ai bien compris, Sergey ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: There are these... \c[3]Evotars\c[0] in CrossWorlds?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Il y a ces... \c[3]Évotars\c[0] dans CrossWorlds ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: And they copy the personality and memories of players?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Et ils copient la personnalité et la mémoire des joueurs ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: That is the other thing...\. there really should not be any Evotars in CrossWorlds at all.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: C'est ça l'autre truc...\. Il ne devrait pas y avoir d'Évotars dans CrossWorlds.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: All I know is that they found \c[3]someone\c[0] that supported their continued research on Evotars.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Tout ce que je sais, c'est qu'ils ont trouvé \c[3]quelqu'un\c[0] pour financer leurs recherches sur les Évotars.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: They even wanted me to join them...\. but I declined.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ils ont même voulu que je les rejoigne...\. Mais j'ai refusé.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: That whole endeavor... it seemed very risky to me.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Toute cette affaire... Ça me semblait très risqué.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Anyway, it was not long afterwards that I entirely \c[3]lost contact\c[0] with them.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Rapidement, j'ai fini par complètement \c[3]perdre le contact\c[0] avec eux.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I had not heard from them for years.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Je n'ai pas eu de nouvelles d'eux depuis des années.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: That was until recently... when I \c[3]discovered Lea\c[0], hidden within the game's database.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Jusqu'à très récemment... quand j'ai \c[3]découvert Lea\c[0], caché à l'intérieur de la base de donnée du jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: And that is how the whole thing started.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Et c'est comme cela que tout a commencé.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I took some time off from work and logged Lea into the game... looking for \c[3]answers\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: J'ai pris quelques congés et j'ai connecté Lea au jeu... pour chercher des \c[3]réponses\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I know as much.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ça je sais.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: So how did ye end up in that place?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Mais ce que je veux savoir, c'est comment vous avez atterri là.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Well... that is where things started to become strange.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Bien... c'est là que les choses ont commencé à devenir étranges.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: We were pulled into an area that was not supposed to be part of the official Playground... \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: On a été arraché du jeu et mis dans cet endroit qui n'était pas censé faire partie du Terrain de jeu officiel... \c[3]\v[area.arid.name]\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: \c[3]Gautham\c[0] and \c[3]Shizuka\c[0]...\. they were both there.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: \c[3]Gautham\c[0] et \c[3]Shizuka\c[0]...\. ils étaient là tous les deux.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: And then there was this \c[3]masked person\c[0] we saw on the last day.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Et il y avait cette troisième personne \c[3]avec un masque\c[0] qu'on a vu le dernier jour.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: But \c[3]Satoshi\c[0]...\. he was nowhere to be found.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Mais \c[3]Satoshi\c[0]...\. On ne l'a vu nulle part.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: We were close...\. really close to the answers.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: On était près...\. vraiment très près d'obtenir des réponses à nos questions.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Yet... we could not afford to stay there. It was too \c[3]dangerous\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Mais... on ne pouvait pas prendre le risque de rester. C'était trop \c[3]dangereux\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: How come?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ah bon ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Somebody with administrative access to that area was \c[3]tracking my connection\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Quelqu'un avec un accès administrateur à cette zone \c[3]traçait mes connexions\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: They tried to \c[3]locate\c[0] me... and almost succeeded.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ils ont essayé de me \c[3]localiser\c[0]... et ils auraient presque réussi...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I just barely escaped it by minimizing communication with Lea over the last few days.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: ... Si je n'avais pas réduit mes communications avec Lea au minimum ces derniers jours.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: In the end...\. we just had to escape.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Au final...\. Il fallait que l'on s'échappe.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I see...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Je vois...
Heu....

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Man, that really is a lot to take in, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Bon sang, ça en fait beaucoup à digérer à la fois, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: How about we take a little break?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Si on faisait une petite pause ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Lea? Maybe a little stroll around the ship would help you to loosen up a bit?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Lea ? peut-être qu'une petite balade autour du navire te détendra un peu ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Surely that's no problem, right Cap?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ça ne devrait pas poser problème, non, Cap' ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I sure don't like ye deciding that by yerself...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Je ne supporte pas quand tu cherches à décider à ma place...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: But sure, it's alright.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Mais oui, pas de problème.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Great! Then how about you show Lea around a bit?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Cool ! Peut-être que tu pourrais emmener Lea pour voir des trucs ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Why am I now...\.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Et pourquoi maintenant je...\.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Please, I'd just like to have a little word with Sergey for a moment.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: S'il te plaît, j'aimerais bien toucher deux mots rapidement à Sergey.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Fine.\. Follow me, lass.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: OK. Suis-moi, fillette.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Carla? Is something the matter?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Carla ? Quelque chose ne va pas ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Mister, I got a question for you!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Mister, j'ai une question pour toi !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Something the poor girl is probably worrying about.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Une question que la pauvre fille doit peut-être déjà se poser.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: ...Yes?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: ... Oui ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Once you find Satoshi and everything has been cleared up...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Une fois que tu trouveras Satoshi et que tout sera arrangé...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: ...what will happen to her?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: ... qu'est-ce qu'elle va devenir ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Ahh, there she is!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ahh, là voilà !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Woah there, girl!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Doucement, doucement, Chérie !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: You're much lighter than I expected!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Tu es bien plus légère que je le pensais !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Lea, do not hug real people like that!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Lea, ne fais pas des câlins à des personnes réelles comme ça !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Your instant matter might break!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ton instant-matière risque de casser !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Sorry!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Désolé !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: The wee lass sure got clingy!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: La ptite fillette est vraiment devenue attachante !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Yes...\. she tends to do that a lot these days.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Oui...\. Elle fait souvent ça ces derniers temps.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Let the girl have her hugs!\. It really has been a long time, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Laisse la fille avoir ses câlins !\. C'est que ça faisait longtemps !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I heard things are going really well over at the Playground.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: J'ai cru comprendre que les choses se passaient bien sur le Terrain de Jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Ya got your own little village now, isn't that right?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Tu as ton propre petit village maintenant, pas vrai ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I really wish we could pay a visit, but we're all still very busy around here.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: J'aurais bien voulu venir te rendre visite, mais on est tous un peu occupé par ici.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Aye.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Aye.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Lot to do ever since construction on the \c[3]new game\c[0] started.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Il y a plein de chose à faire depuis le début de la construction du \c[3]nouveau jeu\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Hush...\. that is not supposed to be public yet.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Chut...\. Ce n'est pas censé être rendu public.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: But yes.\. Instatainment is working on a successor to CrossWorlds right now.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Mais oui.\. Instatainment est en train de travailler à un successeur à CrossWorlds en ce moment.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I suppose it is fine if you know about it.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: J'imagine que c'est ok si tu le sais.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: After all, you are unlikely to spread the news.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Après tout, tu risques pas de répandre la nouvelle.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Looks like we'll have to take a few dozen more trips over the sea.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: On dirait que l'on va encore devoir faire quelques douzaines d'allers-retours sur la mer.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: What of it?\. Otherwise we'd be shippin' things elsewhere.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Et alors ?\. Sinon on serait en train de livrer des trucs ailleurs.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: You have been on this planet for quite some time now.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ça fait depuis un moment que tu es sur cette planète.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Do you not miss the old days working in intergalactic logistics?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ça ne te manque pas le bon vieux temps quand tu travaillais dans la logistique intergalactique ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Nah...\. I'm used to all the water by now.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Bof...\. Je suis habitué à tout cette eau maintenant.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: What?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Quoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Oh, ya didn't know, Lea?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Oh, tu savais pas, Lea ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: The cap used to work on a \c[3]spaceship\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Le cap' travaillait avant dans un \c[3]vaisseau spatial\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Aye.\. Shippin' things through the \c[3]sea of stars\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Aye.\. Je transportais des trucs à travers l'\c[3]océan d'étoiles\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It's not as excitin' as it sounds.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ce n'était pas aussi réjouissant que ça en a l'air.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: A clear night sky like this...\. It has always impressed me.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Un ciel dégagé dans la nuit comme ça...\. Ça m'a toujours impressionné.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: A boundless sea of stars...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Un océan sans fin d'étoiles...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: ...a boundless sea of stars.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: ... un océan sans fin d'étoiles.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: When you see it, you start to realize...\. just how insignificant we are to this world.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Quand on le voit, on finit par comprendre...\. à quel point on est tous insignifiant aux yeux de ce monde.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Why?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Is everything okay, Lea?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Tout va bien, Lea ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: You are probably tired.\. It has been a long day for you, correct?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Tu es probablement fatiguée.\. C'était une longue journée pour toi, pas vrai ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Well...\. you have a warm bed to return to.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Hé bien...\. tu as un lit tout chaud qui t'attends !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It is time for me to leave as well, actually.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Il est temps pour moi de partir, d'ailleurs.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It was really nice to see you all again!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: C'était vraiment sympa de tous vous revoir !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: The pleasure was all ours!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Le plaisir était pour nous !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Aye.\. Still, never would have guessed I'd meet you in this kind of get-up.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Aye.\. Mais bon, je n'aurais jamais deviné que je te rencontrerais de cette manière-là.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: That is what games are for, correct?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: C'est à ça que servent les jeux, pas vrai ?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Doing things the unusual way.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: À faire des choses de manière non-conventionnelles.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Until next time!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: À la prochaine !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Logout
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Déconnexion

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Alright.\. Time to get back to work!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Aller.\. Il est temps de retourner au travail !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: You're always welcome on this ship, girl.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Tu seras toujours la bienvenue sur ce navire, chérie.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: We already decided to just keep that teleporter down in the cargo hold!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: On s'est déjà mis d'accord pour juste garder le téléporteur dans la soute !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: See ya around!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Porte-toi bien !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Bye!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Bye !

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Time to \c[3]go to bed\c[0] in your house in \c[3]Homestedt\c[0]!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Il est temps d'\c[3]aller au lit\c[0] dans votre maison à \c[3]\v[area.evo-village.name]\c[0] !
